price: Ẹ̀yin ìjọ mi, ta ni ó máa ràn mí lọ́wọ́ níbi (ìyà) Allāhu tí mo bá lé wọn dànù? Ṣé ẹ ò níí lo ìrántí ni?
arabic: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ مَن يَنصُرُنِي مِنَ ٱللَّهِ إِن طَرَدتُّهُمۡۚ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wayāqawmi man yanṣurunī mina al-lahi in ṭaradttuhum afalā tadhakkarūna
